newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SIMEX Nikkei futures pare early gains, end steady.
newsitem.headline: SIMEX Nikkei futures pare early gains, end steady.

text.p: SIMEX Nikkei futures gave up their early gains to end slightly easier in thin, featureless trade on Tuesday.
The benchmark Nikkei 225 December contract finished at 20,910 after hitting a high of 21,065 against a previous settlement at 20,920. Market turnover was 11,685 lots.
Dealers said the dollar's early surge towards 115 yen and continued bullish stance underpinned sentiment, spurring some buying of export-related shares.
